page.title: 10MEDICAL SERVICES 03800597
page.content: {2 general practices,}each with 2 doctors,hold{branch surgeries twice {weekly}in Rochester Village and Drs. are available for house calls.{Pre_ {scriptions}are dispensed by Dr.at surgery,by chemist on production, by chemist and forwarded to the village by school bus.Drs. belonging to{Tyne_ {dale Accident Service}have radio link facilities and carry emergency equip_ ment in their cars.A{district nurse and{health visitors,}making home care visits and attending clinics,work in conjunction with all Drs. Arrangements can be made for a visiting{chiropodist and{physiotherapist.Ambulances}operate from Bellingham and{in emergencies}an ambulance can be obtained from{Redes {dale Army Camp. Transport for hospital appointments can be arranged via Drs. Three hospitals,the nearest 27 miles away, serve the area.
